title: Craftsy, Denver-based online craft giant, cuts 12 percent of workforce
text:
Published By: Denver Post Technology - Today 
Craftsy, the Denver-based firm that offers a slew of online crafting classes, as well as supplies, thinned its operations by laying off 32 e...
